abstract: Anheuser-Busch is introducing a campaign for its Bud Light brand that declares this to be the “Year of the Fan.”
snippet: Anheuser-Busch is introducing a campaign for its Bud Light brand that declares this to be the “Year of the Fan.”
lead_paragraph: 10:52 a.m. | Updated Add Anheuser-Busch to the long list of sponsors of the National Football League that are opening their campaigns to help promote the start of the league’s 2012-13 season.

headline.main: Bud Light Steps Up Its N.F.L. Sponsorship Efforts
